========
courtana
========

|pypi-version|

|license|

|supported-implementations|

Tools for courtship analysis in *Drosophila*.


Installation
============

Available on PyPI::

    pip install courtana

and on Anaconda Cloud::

    conda install -c conda-forge courtana

Requirements
^^^^^^^^^^^^

* ``numpy``
* ``scipy``
* ``pandas``
* ``numexpr``
* ``tables``
